name: RG Recent Posts
author: Rob Gloudemans

sections.description:
Display recent posts in a widget. Where the default widget only let’s you display recent posts of the ‘post’ posttype, with RG Recent Posts you can specify from which post type you want to display the recent posts.

Version 1.1

  • Added Dutch translation.

Version 1.1.1

  • Added Spanish translation. Thanks to Andrew Kurtis (webhostinghub.com)
sections.installation:
1. Upload RG-Recent-Posts.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can activate the widget in the Widget section

short_description: Display recent posts in a widget. Specifiy which post type should be listed.
